description: Delete a project transport plan segment tractor.

flags.name: confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to true to proceed.

permissions: Authorized via ProjectTransportPlanSegmentTractorPolicy, which delegates destroy permission to the related project transport plan segment policy.
side_effects: Deletes a project transport plan segment tractor.
validation_notes: Requires the segment tractor <id> argument and --confirm=true. Deletion is blocked when the segment tractor is managed by a plan tractor, unless deleted via a cascading destroy from a plan tractor or segment.
